CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 13, 1958, pg. 23, reads: "Tough Game - Jimmy Atkins, right, runner-up in the Ammon tennis tournament, congratulated Mrs. Clare Brown, center, runner-up in the women's division of the meet.  On the left is Charles Shelton, who won the men's singles tourney.  Atkins, one of Pittsburgh's top all-around athletes, just recently began competing as a tennis player. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tennis players Charles Shelton, Clare Brown, and Jimmy Atkins holding rackets and posed at net on court, vertical format
